attributes.action: Give People With Coeliacs Disease & Wheat and Gluten Intolerance Free Prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, people with coeliacs disease, wheat intolerance or gluten intolerance have to either pay roughly 5-8 times the normal cost for their food which contains no wheat or gluten. (source, coeliacs.co.uk) or buy their food on prescription, whihc can be expensive and aren't entitled to any help with the cost of the food they need, which is digusting really.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
